definition: not a single grain was reaped (as in a bad harvest year)
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Li planted two mu of broad beans last  autumn, but he has seen no  yield because of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天李彦博种了两亩蚕豆，但由于干旱颗粒无收。

sentences.english: Li planted two mu of broad beans last autumn, but he has seen no yield because of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天李彦博种了两亩蚕豆，但由于干旱颗粒无收。

definition: lit. yellow does not reach green (idiom); the yellow autumn crop does not last until the green spring crop/temporary deficit in manpower or resources/unable to make ends meet
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
lit. to ruin the enterprise for the sake of one basketful/to fail through lack of a final effort/to spoil the ship for a ha'penny worth of tar (idiom)
to have no opportunity/no way (of doing sth)/no chance/no connection/not placed (in a competition)/(in pop lyrics) no chance of love, no place to be together etc
